reviews.review_msg: No lectures or exams, 2 presentations, 2 assignments, and weekly quizzes. Very manageable course and you learn a lot if you really read the papers, which are really interesting. Dr. P was awesome, though a little disorganized. He cares a lot and emphasizes open, in-class discussions. Would recommend for a laid-back but really interesting class!
Great Prof. Not a standard box mentality kind of person; so you learn a lot! Highly recommended.
